thread.title: The Edmonton Oilers played hockey with some good dogs
thread.title_full: The Edmonton Oilers played hockey with some good dogs

author: nick pants
title: The Edmonton Oilers played hockey with some good dogs
text:
These are very good hockey dogs
The Edmonton Oilers had a very good practice with some very good hockey dogs on Friday.
The good dogs were hanging out with the Oilers as part of a promotion of the Edmonton Police Service Canine Unit.
The hockey dogs’ puck handling skills could use some work.
But that is okay, because nobody could hold a candle to their defensive skills.
Hockey and dogs have a long history together. We’ve seen hockey dogs sitting in the stands enjoying a nice hockey game . We’ve seen good hockey dogs drop the puck in a game . We’ve even seen good hockey weiner dogs throw on hockey gear and play themselves.
This is a fine tradition, and it should be celebrated more across every sports league.
h/t RMNB
